response.original_title: We Are Now 25: The Story of Sonic Unyon Records
response.overview: In the early 90s, three young musicians from the band, Tristan Psionic, used punk-rock ethics to build a record label out of Hamilton, Ontario. For 25 years they shaped the independent Canadian music scene in Hamilton, Ontario & beyond. This is a film about how artist's dreams need to be fueled with grit, and that with the proper friends you can achieve them with a few battle scars along the way.
response.title: We Are Now 25: The Story of Sonic Unyon Records
